events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but the package has not arrived yet and the tracking status hasn't updated for days.
The reported issue involves a delayed delivery with no recent tracking updates, categorized accordingly.
Customer was assigned to a shipping support agent to handle the inquiry regarding their late delivery.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand your order hasn’t arrived and I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address so I can check with the carrier?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 789 Elm Street, Springfield.
I contacted the shipping company and they confirmed a delay due to bad weather. Your package is expected to arrive within 3 days.
Thanks for the update and for checking with the carrier. I appreciate your help and the expected delivery timeframe.
We consider this matter resolved as the delay is confirmed temporary and delivery is scheduled shortly.
Just checking in to confirm whether your package has arrived as expected and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday. Everything is in good condition. Thanks again for your support.
We are closing this case now that your delivery has been completed successfully and you are satisfied.
Please consider completing a short survey to provide feedback on your support experience today.
